page.title: 15Transport Depot, Dargate.
page.content: An international transport depot is situated at Dargate Farm, Dargate. Articulated container lorries depart from here each week to many destinations in Europe. The vehicles only return to their depot perhaps once in a week, which does reduce the inconvenience to local inhabitants. Dargate residents are only aware that the depot is there when they meet one of the lorries round the narrow lanes or hear the refrigerating compressors on the containers of food working during the night. The Company employs three administrative staff, one fitter and apprentice plus several drivers. Only three of the staff live in the village.
